title: Super Readers
body:
Because I'm bored and had nothing better to do, here's a tally of the most active commenters on this site.

1. Oz => 52
2. Newell => 35
3. Justin => 23
3. Sandra => 23
3. Whitty => 23
4. Tim => 18
5. Einahpets => 17
5. Fyse => 17
6. WhimsyChick => 16
7. Aaron => 15
8. Chuck => 14
9. Nicole => 11
10. James => 10
10. Amy => 10

Thanks for reading, and especially for commenting! It's much appreciated.
author: Dan

comments.author: whitty
comments.body: obviously,this post is only to up my stats.  KAABAM!

comments.author: einahpets
comments.body: Hey! 17! That's the day of my birth. Whoohoo! Coinsidence? I think not.

comments.author: Chuck
comments.body: 8th place!! This is a sham! I've been here from the beginning!!

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: And so a commenting war has begun...

comments.author: Bryan
comments.body: When do you start judging quality over quantity?  :)

comments.author: Chuck
comments.body: Amen to that.

comments.author: Chuck
comments.body:
...wait - what?

(I hope you're adding all three of these.)

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Happy belated birthday, Chuck.

comments.author: Chuck
comments.body:
Thanks. I woke up with a hangover like you wouldn't believe. You know, with IM's we wouldn't have to talk over your comments like this.

(Seriously, you're adding these, right?)

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Unfortunately, the counting stopped when the post went live... but I'm sure there will be another post somewhere down the line.

comments.author: Chuck
comments.body:
sunova... Alright, well I still think I just took 6th at least.

(Amanda left a couple of the party pics off the site - if ya know what I mean.)

comments.author: Chuck
comments.body: Ok, Ok. I'm lying. The pictures were staged. I actually spent my birthday drinking alone. <wipes away a tear>

comments.author: Newell
comments.body:
I don't comment for competition. I comment for... some other reason that is lost to me now but is most assuredly not competition. So there! 

I can't believe Oz has that many more comments than me though! Wait, I didn't mean that. It sounds too competitive.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: This isn't a competition, folks... but had it been, Oz would've beat you all - and quite soundly as well.

comments.author: Oz
comments.body:
Yikes, I had no idea.  I'm not sure what to make of it.  Am I Dan's obsessive stalker?  Or am I the most kick-ass fan of this site EVER?  I guess only Dan can answer that question.

One more thing--the rest of you are LOSERS!

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Oz, I think you are the most kick-ass obsessive stalker/fan of this site EVER!

comments.author: Chuck
comments.body: sigh....

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.body: Just wanted to let you know: I ordered a couple of The Moxie shirts today!!

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Hey, THANKS STEPHANIE! Much appreciated. I hope they don't suck.

comments.author: Bryan
comments.body: Leave the competition for Dr. Mario.  Does everyone think they are the best ever at that game? (oh, to find someone that can beat me...)  Why is there no decent online version of this game?

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I'm quite good at Mario M.D., but no where near as good as I am at Tetris.

comments.author: Janet
comments.body:
Who knew all I had to do was to step it up so I could get recognized via a blogger  post?

Man, now that ship has sailed.:(

Janet

comments.author: Tim
comments.body:
Nice!  Top five, baby.  Time to celebrate in fifth place style...  

*opens a bottle of Boone's Farm Strawberry*
